name: Robots n Lasers
description:
Robots n Lasers
is a fast paced shooter game, in which you have to fight yourself through dark corridors and starlit floating platforms. Fight against different enemy types designed to adapt your playstyle according to which enemy compositions you currently are facing.

The game comes with 4 Levels each with 3 different variants. So there is a normal Level and for each Level there are two Challenge Levels.

- 6 Enemy types
- 3 Weapons
- 4 Abilities
- Different methods of upgrading your character
- Dynamic difficulty
